thread.title: Chennaiyin FC eye better game in second season of ISL, says coach
thread.title_full: Chennaiyin FC eye better game in second season of ISL, says coach - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Chennaiyin FC eye better game in second season of ISL, says coach
text: Chennai, Oct 03 (ANI): Ahead of the second season of the Indian Super League (ISL) football championship kicking off this weekend, Chennaiyin Football Club manager, Marco Materazzi, said that his team is more prepared to put out a quality game throughout the tournament. The tournament is scheduled to start today as Chennaiyin FC kick off the game on home ground in Chennai. Last season Chennaiyin FC lost 4-3 to Kerala Blasters FC to remain semifinalists, but Materazzi says they are better prepared this year. The Italian coach also said his team was prepared to face reigning champions, Atletico de Kolkata in the first ISL match. He added he was happy to be part of starting a movement of football in India through the ISL. Â»
